snippet: Tony Hendra, a Lampoon writer and contributor to many of its best-selling recordings, is involved with this one, “Are There Any Triggers Here Tonight?”...
abstract: National Lampoon announces plans to release comedy album Are There Any Triggers Here Tonight?, its first recording in 35 years.
lead_paragraph: Tony Hendra, a Lampoon writer and contributor to many of its best-selling recordings, is involved with this one, “Are There Any Triggers Here Tonight?”

headline.main: A New National Lampoon Album, 35 Years After the Last One
headline.print_headline: National Lampoon Album Is the First in 35 Years

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Are There Any Triggers Here Tonight? (Album)
